attributes.comment:
I would like to go on the record against any proposed fee increases to anything
related to adoption. We just brought home 2 children from Ethiopia and are
considering international adoption in the future. Adoption is expensive enough as
it is, without paying more for a service that isn't all that streamlined to begin with.

Our experience in Customs & Immigration in Dulles International Airport was a
nightmare! The staff were rude, the whole process was disorganized. We had an
approx. 4 hour layover and because of our wait in "secondary", we were minutes
away from missing our flight. People were processed in no particular order.
People who entered last were processed before many others. Even after the
supervisor called for all IR3s & IR4s to be processed, the employees were still
processsing single individuals. I would be absolutely livid about having to pay
even more next time around for this poor service.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Angela Roller
